effects: Increase the limit burst gauge fill rate by 100%
Increase ATK by 15% when equipped with a Fist
Increase MP by 15% when equipped with a Light Shield
name: Drive Boost

desc_short.0: Increase burst stone fill rate, boost ATK when equipped with fists, and boost MP when equipped with a L shield
desc_short.5: Las piedras de estallido recuperan más EL, aumenta el ATQ al usar puños y aumenta los PM al llevar un escudo L
